Name: 1st District
Description: A central district with a blend of residential areas, shops, and cultural sites.

Name: 2nd District
Description: A primarily residential area with several schools, parks, and local businesses.

Name: 3rd District
Description: Known for its green spaces, including the Daphni Monastery and nearby parks.

Name: 4th District
Description: A quieter residential area, ideal for families, with easy access to nature and amenities.
